waypoint_navigation.py

1 #!/usr/bin/env python3
2 import re
3 import rospy
4 import sys
5 import actionlib
6 import rospkg
7 from geometry_msgs.msg import PoseArray
8 from move_base_msgs.msg import MoveBaseAction, MoveBaseGoal
9 from std_srvs.srv import Trigger
10 from multi_robot_sim.srv import MultiRobotSimGoalNodes
11 from actionlib_msgs.msg import GoalID
12 from utils.state_machine import StateMachine
13 from utils.osm_utils import OsmUtil
14 
15 class WaypointNavigation:
16  def __init__(self,namespace):
17  """WaypointNavigation
18  This module implements the robot way point navigation
19  It has 4 states idle, navigation, pause, and end state
20  """
21  self.namespace = namespace
22  self.waypoints = PoseArray()
23 
24  path = rospy.get_param("/yaml_path")
25  self.gg = OsmUtil(path)
26 
27  # Service to pause/start/stop waypoint navigation
28  self.start_waypoint_srv = rospy.Service("start_waypoint", Trigger, self.handle_start_waypoint)
29  self.stop_waypoint_srv = rospy.Service("stop_waypoint", Trigger, self.handle_stop_waypoint)
30  self.pause_waypoint_srv = rospy.Service("pause_waypoint", Trigger, self.handle_pause_waypoint)
31  self.send_waypoint_srv = rospy.Service("send_waypoint", MultiRobotSimGoalNodes, self.handle_send_waypoint)
32 
33  # Move base client
34  self.move_base_client = actionlib.SimpleActionClient("move_base", MoveBaseAction)
35  rospy.loginfo("connecting to move base")
36  self.move_base_client.wait_for_server()
37  rospy.loginfo("connected to move base")
38 
39  # Publisher
40  self.cancel_pub = rospy.Publisher("move_base/cancel",GoalID,queue_size=10)
41 
42  # Params
43  self.distance_tolerance = 0.1
44  self.robot_status = -1
45 
46  # Intial state transition
47  self.mode = None
48  self.transition = ""
49 
50  def handle_start_waypoint(self,req):
51  """
52  This service set the transition to start
53  """
54  self.transition = "resume"
55  return (True, "start waypoint navigation")
56 
57  def handle_stop_waypoint(self,req):
58  """
59  This service set the transition to cancel
60  """
61  self.transition = "cancel"
62  return (True, "cancel waypoint navigation")
63 
64  def handle_pause_waypoint(self,req):
65  """
66  This service set the transition to pause
67  """
68  self.transition = "pause"
69  return (True, "Pause waypoint navigation")
70 
71  def handle_send_waypoint(self,req):
72  """
73  This service handles the waypoint navigation
74  It formats the waypoints in to goals depending on the mode
75  mode0 : 1-way
76  mode1 : Disjointed loop
77  mode2 : Closed loop
78  """
79  nodes = list(req.nodes)
80  if req.mode == "mode0":
81  self.waypoints = self.gg.getGoals(nodes)
82  self.mode = "normal"
83 
84  elif req.mode == "mode2":
85  nodes.append(nodes[0])
86  self.waypoints = self.gg.getGoals(nodes)
87  self.mode = "loop"
88 
89  elif req.mode == "mode1":
90  reverse = nodes[:-1][::-1]
91  nodes = nodes + reverse
92  self.waypoints = self.gg.getGoals(nodes)
93  self.mode = "loop"
94 
95  # print(nodes)
96  if(self.waypoints == None):
97  self.transition = ""
98  return (False)
99 
100  self.transition = "navigate"
101  return (True)
102 
103  def run(self):
104  """
105  Calls the state machine to run
106  """
107  self.generateStateMahine().run()
108 
109  def generateStateMahine(self):
110  """
111  Initialise the state machine and add all the releveant states
112  """
113  sm = StateMachine()
114  sm.add_state("idleState",self.idleState)
115  sm.add_state("NavigationState",self.navigationState)
116  sm.add_state("pauseState",self.pauseState)
117  sm.add_state("endState",None,end_state=1)
118  sm.set_start("idleState")
119 
120  return sm
121 
122  # State machine states
123  def idleState(self):
124  """
125  This is the idle sate, it waits for the transition "navigate" to go to the navigation state
126  """
127  if self.transition == "navigate":
128  self.transition = ""
129  return ("NavigationState")
130 
131  else:
132  return ("idleState")
133 
134  def navigationState(self):
135  """
136  This is the navigation sate, it sends the goals to the waypoint navigation
137  """
138  if(self.waypoints.poses):
139  pose = self.waypoints.poses.pop()
140  if self.mode == "loop":
141  self.waypoints.poses.insert(0,pose)
142  return self.waypointNavigation(pose)
143 
144  else:
145  cancel_msg = GoalID()
146  self.cancel_pub.publish(cancel_msg)
147  self.transition = ""
148  return ("idleState")
149 
150  def waypointNavigation(self,pose):
151  """
152  The waypoint navigation sends the goal to the move base
153  if success it will return to the navigations tate
154  if paused it will return to the pause state
155  if failed or cancel it will return to the idle state
156  @parm pose Pose
157  @return state
158  """
159  goal = self.createGoalMsg(pose)
160  rospy.logwarn("Going to goal...")
161  self.move_base_client.send_goal(goal)
162 
163  while(True):
164  robot_state = self.move_base_client.get_state()
165 
166  if(robot_state in [3,4,5,9]):
167  break
168 
169  if self.transition == "pause":
170  cancel_msg = GoalID()
171  self.cancel_pub.publish(cancel_msg)
172  self.transition = ""
173  self.waypoints.poses.insert(0,goal.target_pose.pose)
174  return("pauseState")
175 
176  elif self.transition == "cancel":
177  cancel_msg = GoalID()
178  self.cancel_pub.publish(cancel_msg)
179  self.transition = ""
180  return("idleState")
181 
182 
183  return ("navigationState")
184 
185 
186  def createGoalMsg(self, pose):
187  """
188  The function converts the Pose msg to MoveBaseGoal msg
189  @param pose Pose
190  @return goal MoveBaseGoal
191  """
192  goal = MoveBaseGoal()
193  goal.target_pose.header.frame_id = self.namespace + "/odom"
194  goal.target_pose.pose = pose
195  goal.target_pose.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
196 
197  return goal
198 
199 
200  def pauseState(self):
201  """
202  This is the pause sate
203  If resume it reutrns to the navgation state
204  If cancel it retunrs to the idle state
205  @return state
206  """
207  if self.transition == "resume":
208  self.transition = ""
209  return("navigationState")
210  elif self.transition == "cancel":
211  self.transition = ""
212  return("idleState")
213  return("pauseState")
214 
215 if __name__ == '__main__':
216  # initialize node
217  rospy.init_node('waypoint_navigation')
218  rospy.loginfo("Running waypoint navigation node")
219 
220  # Get the arguments
221  args = rospy.myargv(argv=sys.argv)
222  if(len(args) != 2):
223  rospy.logwarn('Namespace name cannot be empty')
224  exit()
225  namespace = args[1]
226  W = WaypointNavigation(namespace)
227  W.run()
